word:
Chap. 2 - The Christian and Psychology

     Laws of the Mind Ordained by God.--He who created the mind and ordained its laws, provided for its development in accordance with them. [NOTE: THERE IS PERFECT HARMONY BETWEEN THE BIBLE AND TRUE SCIENCE. PSYCHOLOGY IS THE SCIENCE AND STUDY OF THE MIND AND HUMAN BEHAVIOR.--COMPILERS.]--Ed 41 (1903).
